title: Part 131 - RULES AND REGULATIONS FOR THE SCHEDULING, ADJOURNING AND CONDUCT OF ADMINISTRATIVE HEARINGS RELATING TO THE RECOVERY OF ERRONEOUS PAYMENTS AND OVERPAYMENTS MADE BY THE OFFICE OF UNCLAIMED FUNDS
content:
Part 131 - RULES AND REGULATIONS FOR THE SCHEDULING, ADJOURNING AND CONDUCT OF ADMINISTRATIVE HEARINGS RELATING TO THE RECOVERY OF ERRONEOUS PAYMENTS AND OVERPAYMENTS MADE BY THE OFFICE OF UNCLAIMED FUNDS

§ 131.1 - Background
§ 131.2 - Notice of determination of erroneous payment
§ 131.3 - Notice of hearing
§ 131.4 - Conduct of hearings
§ 131.5 - Presentation of the payee's case
§ 131.6 - Presentation of the case of the office of unclaimed funds
§ 131.7 - Briefs and memoranda of law
§ 131.8 - Adjournment of hearing and scheduling of subsequent hearings
§ 131.9 - Failure of claimant/payee to appear
§ 131.10 - Decision and review

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
